TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Guguc, title = Guguc, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Guguc} }

S.FORM: Guguc Itiniay i Nan'ao Cen no Yilan ko Guguc a niyaro', 98 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 331 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 89% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 295 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 11% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 81%, Amis 2%, Truku 1%, Cou 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Gogoc Itiniay i Nan'ao Cen no Yilan ko Gogoc a niyaro', 98 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 331 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 89% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 295 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 11% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 36 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 81%, Amis 2%, Troko 1%, Coo 1%, roma 2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
